meanings.definition: A device used to measure the concentration of salt in a solution.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a salimeters to check the salt levels in the water sample.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician calibrated the salimeters before conducting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The salimeters beeped happily when it detected the right amount of salt.
meanings.sent4: The salimeters acted like a detective, uncovering the hidden salt content in the liquid.
meanings.sent5: With the salimeters in hand, the chef ensured the perfect saltiness of the soup.
